overview: Sue brings her friend, 18-year-old Anne, over for a sleepover. John, Sue's father, comes to greet the girls. This is the first time John is meeting Anne and he can't help but check her out. Later that night, the girls are in bed, snoring softly. Anne stirs, sensing a presence beside her. Her eyes flutter open and she sees John lying beside her, silently jerking off.
title: Any Friend of My Daughter's...
